name: Froggy (itch)
description:
A simple frogger clone for two players

Try to get your frog across the street and the river to the top of the screen to progress to the next level. The speed of the cars and logs increases with each level. Each frog has 3 lives. 

Control the green frog with your arrow keys and the orange frog with WASD.

Credits:

Theresa - code

Moritz - graphics

Made in Love2d for My First Game Jam

Disclaimer: Moritz has 6 years of programming experience, but did not contribute any significant code to the game. He did, however, help Theresa, who is new to coding, with explanations and hints.
